element description: Level of geographic focus or coverage
element controlled values or terms: Site||Subnational||National||Region||Global

element name: Latitude and longitude location coordinates for the resource or its focus
element description: Use for polygons, shapes, study sites etc. Longitude location coordinates should be recorded in decimal degrees (DD). Recording 4 digits to the right of the decimal provides an accuracy of 10m.
element guidance: Example of a latitude/longitude in Bolivia: -16.9013, -62.0244

element name: Latitude location coordinate for the resource or its focus
element description: Use for polygons, shapes, study sites etc. Latitude location coordinates should be recorded in decimal degrees (DD). Recording 4 digits to the right of the decimal provides an accuracy of 10m.
element guidance: Example of a latitude in Bolivia: -16.9013

element name: Longitude location coordinate for the resource or its focus
element description: Use for polygons, shapes, study sites etc. Longitude location coordinates should be recorded in decimal degrees (DD). Recording 4 digits to the right of the decimal provides an accuracy of 10m.
element guidance: Example of a longitude in Bolivia: -62.0244

element description: A narrative summary of the resource.
Information about rights held in and over the resource.
element guidance: Indicate whether the resource is confidential (and limited access), restricted (and limited access) or public (limited access or open access)

element description: A class of entity for whom the resource is intended or useful
element controlled values or terms: TBC

element description: Indicate if the complete resource is available for use
element controlled values or terms: Full text available

element description: Include sufficient bibliographic detail to identify the resource as unambiguously as possible.
Digital object identifier - usually for articles and books/chapters
The size or duration of the resource; Usually the total pages or other dimensions
The file format or physical medium of the resource
element controlled values or terms: TXT|PDF||PNG||JPG||MP3||MP4

element description: Any ID associated with the item or resource.
element guidance: Use other elements for ISBN or DOI

element description: International standard book number
A language of the resource. Terms should be in lower case ISO 639-1 (aka Alpha 2) format.
element controlled values or terms: ar||zh||nl||en||fr||de||it||ja||pt||ru||es

element description: Popular name for the language of the resource
element controlled values or terms: Arabic||Chinese||Dutch||English||French||German||Italian||Japanese||Portuguese||Russian||Spanish

element description: An internet link to any other associated item
element guidance: Try to always link to any standard and permament identifier (eg, not a PDF)

element name: Link to an image, photo or other multimedia
element description: An internet link to an associated image
An account of the resource
element guidance: Any additional information about the resource not covered in any other element

element description: Journal article issue number, series number, or any other identifying number
Start/end pagination of a journal article or chapter
Usually assigned by a repository, eg a handle address in a DSpace repository
A person or organization owning or managing rights over a resource.
A legal document giving official permission to do something with a resource
element guidance: Normally the type of license, indicated by a short name/code - select from control list

Persons or organizations intellectually responsible for the content of the resource.

element guidance: Usually the name of an organization

ORCID identifier of individuals

element description: Name of an organization or person that can be contacted about the resource
element guidance: Avoid links that are short-lived; check permission first

RoR ID for an organization
element guidance: Assign for resources associated to organizations
